name: Pineapple Hunt
description:
Your cult members are angry! You convinced fellow cult members to allow your brother Carl to join your ranks, but how does Carl show his gratitude to you? Not with a cake or a party, but by stealing all the Holy Pineapples from the sacred temple! After this, your cult members sent you out of the temple and  commanded that you bring back the ten Holy Pineapples. Now you need to go in valleys, caves, and Carl's robotic fortress.

Watch out!! Carl also programmed his killer toy robots to protect the Pineapples as well as put down spikes to add to their defenses! 

Nevertheless, the cult members believe in you, and you believe in yourself! Hopefully that is enough!

Good Luck! 

How do I Play?!

Use the A/D keys or the Left and Right arrow keys to move Left and Right!

If you are stuck or ran out of jumps use the Tab key to open up the Restart Menu!

Press the Spacebar to jump!

Pick up pineapple slices to do double, triple, quadruple or a, quintuple jump! The counter in the top left corner of the screen will tell you how many Extra Jumps you have!

But wait! 

There is a rumor that Carl put down lots of spikes to protect the famous Awesome Pineapple, that can allow you teleport to a random Pineapple, while still collecting the Pineapples you skipped over! Can you check if that rumor is true for me please!
